part1000.publication_index.name: CR_Additive
part1000.publication_index.wg.number.publication_set_comments: Change request for additive manufacturing part and build information for AP242 Edition 2
part1000.publication_index.description: Publication index of the change request for additive manufacturing part and build information for AP242 Edition 2. It includes the module that is to be added to Part1000 as part of change request CR_Additive. The STEPmod CVS repository should be tagged as CR_Additive before submitting the change request.
